@ueffes The Alpha installer requires 3.3.0.10944 or LATER. It will install on the newest version of Lich King.
@1Haggis1 Yes, you can have enGB and enUS version at the same time. However you need to manually change folder names and/or registry keys to "trick" the installers.
The way i did this (enGB already installed):
1. Rename the "World of Warcraft" folder to "World of Warcraft enGB". This way the enUS installer won't find wow.exe, so it will allow to install the game (again).
2. Install the enUS version to the same folder, where the enGB version was earlier ("World of Warcraft").
3. Install the Cataclysm Alpha to the default folder ("World of Warcraft Beta").
4. Rename "World of Warcraft" to "World of Warcraft enUS", and rename "World of Warcraft enGB" back to "World of Warcraft".
@ j0eStER Whats a sandbox ? And how do I get one :P ?

This works. I was just playing a few minutes ago. There is a download a couple links below this one that says "Sanbox 1.0" or something like that at the end. 

Download that torrent and this one and you'll be good to go.

-Download the Sandbox
-Install this
-Run Sandbox (should be on your Desktop after you extract it)
-Open up the World of Warcraft Beta folder and find WoW.exe
-Run WoW.exe (NOT THE Launcher.exe)
-When the game starts up, login with any username and password. Just make sure the username and password are the same. For example: 
Username - 123456 
Password - 123456
-It should load the game up and then you will have to make a character. I suggest sticking with the one it starts you with. Don't change the class or anything because the client will either crash or you will spawn and fall forever.


Have fun :)

Note: There are no NPC's and the compass doesn't work. You pretty much just run around.

@zack030394

The Sandbox for this torrent is a couple of links down like I said in my above comment.

In general a sandbox is something where you can run programs in so you don't get viruses on your computer.

For example let's say you download a torrent or a game and you think it might be infected with something. Well, run the launcher in the sandbox to protect your computer from being infected.

To get a sandbox, just google "sandboxie"

It should be the first link. Download and install. Usually to run programs in the sandbox, all you have to do is right click them and then Run Sandboxed.

Again, DO NOT RUN THIS SANDBOXED! There is a certain sandbox that you use for this to work.
